sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Open Operating Standards Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Open Operating Standards Act.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Section 20 takes effect on January 1, 2014.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Section 20 takes effect on January 1, 2014.
